typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		round_distance as double,
		avgAmount2 as double,
		avgTip2 as double
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	format: 'delta',
	fileSystem: 'mycontainer',
	folderPath: 'deltataxi') ~> source1
source1 alterRow(deleteIf(round_distance<10.0)) ~> AlterRow1
AlterRow1 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	format: 'delta',
	fileSystem: 'mycontainer',
	folderPath: 'deltataxi',
	mergeSchema: true,
	autoCompact: false,
	optimizedWrite: false,
	vacuum: 0,
	deletable: true,
	insertable: false,
	updateable: false,
	upsertable: false,
	keys:['round_distance','avgAmount2','avgTip2'],
	umask: 0022,
	preCommands: [],
	postCommands: [],
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> sink1

properties.description: This pipeline will copy objects from one group. The objects belonging to this group will be copied parallelly.

activities.name: ListObjectsFromOneGroup
activities.description: List objects from one group and iterate each of them to downstream activities

activities.name: RouteJobsBasedOnLoadingBehavior
activities.description: Check the loading behavior for each object if it requires full load or incremental load. If it is Default or FullLoad case, do full load. If it is DeltaLoad case, do incremental load via watermark column to identify changes.

activities.name: FullLoadOneObject
activities.description: Take a full snapshot on this object and copy it to the destination

defaultActivities.name: DefaultFullLoadOneObject
defaultActivities.description: Take a full snapshot on this object and copy it to the destination

source.sqlReaderQuery:
select id, member_id, loan_amnt, funded_amnt, term, int_rate,emp_title,
emp_length, home_ownership, annual_inc, url, purpose, title from loanstest

typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		medallion as string,
		hack_license as string,
		vendor_id as string,
		rate_code as long,
		store_and_fwd_flag as string,
		pickup_datetime as timestamp,
		dropoff_datetime as timestamp,
		passenger_count as long,
		trip_time_in_secs as long,
		trip_distance as double,
		pickup_longitude as double,
		pickup_latitude as double,
		dropoff_longitude as double,
		dropoff_latitude as double
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	format: 'table') ~> source1
source1 aggregate(groupBy(vendor_id),
	avgDistance = round(avg(trip_distance),2)) ~> Aggregate1
Aggregate1 derive(vendorFullName = case (vendor_id == 'CMT', 'Mobile Knowledge Systems',      vendor_id == 'VTS', 'Verifone Transportation Systems')) ~> DerivedColumn1
DerivedColumn1 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	recreate:true,
	format: 'table',
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> sink1

parameters{
	CustomerID as integer (29485)
}
source(output(
		CustomerID as integer,
		AddressID as integer,
		AddressType as string,
		rowguid as string,
		ModifiedDate as timestamp
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> CustAddress
source(output(
		CustomerID as integer,
		NameStyle as boolean,
		Title as string,
		FirstName as string,
		MiddleName as string,
		LastName as string,
		Suffix as string,
		CompanyName as string,
		SalesPerson as string,
		EmailAddress as string,
		Phone as string,
		PasswordHash as string,
		PasswordSalt as string,
		rowguid as string,
		ModifiedDate as timestamp
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> Customers
source(output(
		AddressID as integer,
		AddressLine1 as string,
		AddressLine2 as string,
		City as string,
		StateProvince as string,
		CountryRegion as string,
		PostalCode as string,
		rowguid as string,
		ModifiedDate as timestamp
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> AWAddress
source(output(
		CustomerID as integer,
		NameStyle as boolean,
		Title as string,
		FirstName as string,
		LastName as string,
		CompanyName as string,
		SalesPerson as string,
		EmailAddress as string,
		Phone as string,
		AddressLine1 as string,
		AddressLine2 as string,
		City as string,
		StateProvince as string,
		CountryRegion as string,
		PostalCode as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	query: '   SELECT\n   		a.CustomerID,\n		NameStyle,\n		Title,\n		FirstName,\n		LastName,\n		CompanyName,\n		SalesPerson,\n		EmailAddress,\n		Phone,\n		AddressLine1,\n		AddressLine2,\n		City,\n		StateProvince,\n		CountryRegion,\n		PostalCode\n   FROM SalesLT.Customer a  \n   INNER JOIN SalesLT.CustomerAddress b ON a.CustomerID = b.CustomerID\n   INNER JOIN SalesLT.Address c ON b.AddressID = c.AddressID\n   WHERE StateProvince = \'Washington\' or StateProvince = \'Pennsylvania\'',
	format: 'query') ~> sourceQuery
Customers, CustAddress join(Customers@CustomerID == CustAddress@CustomerID,
	joinType:'inner',
	matchType:'exact',
	ignoreSpaces: false,
	broadcast: 'auto')~> JoinCustomerBridge
JoinCustomerBridge, AWAddress join(CustAddress@AddressID == AWAddress@AddressID,
	joinType:'inner',
	matchType:'exact',
	ignoreSpaces: false,
	broadcast: 'auto')~> JoinAddress
Customers aggregate(rowcount = count()) ~> RowCount1
JoinAddress aggregate(rowcount = count()) ~> RowCount2
JoinAddress select(mapColumn(
		CustomerID = Customers@CustomerID,
		NameStyle,
		Title,
		FirstName,
		LastName,
		CompanyName,
		SalesPerson,
		EmailAddress,
		Phone,
		AddressLine1,
		AddressLine2,
		City,
		StateProvince,
		CountryRegion,
		PostalCode
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SelectColumns
SelectColumns filter(CustomerID == $CustomerID) ~> WhereFilter
WhereFilter aggregate(rowcount = count()) ~> RowCount3
WhereFilter sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	store: 'cache',
	format: 'inline',
	output: false,
	saveOrder: 0) ~> sink1
sourceQuery sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	format: 'table',
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	errorHandlingOption: 'stopOnFirstError') ~> sink2

scriptLines: MetadataChecker@Pass assert(expectTrue(CountryRegion == 'United States', false, 'assertUsOnly', null, CountryRegion + ' is not valid'),
expectUnique(AddressID, false, 'addressIdUnique', null, "ID of {AddressID} is not unique")) ~> DataQualityRules
MetadataChecker@Fail assert(expectTrue(false(), false, 'failedMetadata', null, 'Not all columns present'),
MetadataChecker@Pass assert(expectTrue(CountryRegion == 'United States', false, 'assertUsOnly', null, CountryRegion + ' is not valid'),
expectUnique(AddressID, false, 'addressIdUnique', null, "ID of {AddressID} is not unique")) ~> DataQualityRules
MetadataChecker@Fail assert(expectTrue(false(), false, 'failedMetadata', null, 'Not all columns present'),
Address1, Address2 assert(expectTrue(Address1@CountryRegion == 'United States', false, 'assertUsOnly', null, CountryRegion + ' is not valid'),
expectUnique(Address1@AddressLine1, false, 'addressIdUnique', null, toString(AddressID) + ' is not unique.'),
expectExists(Address1@AddressID == Address2@AddressID, false, 'assertExists', null, toString(Address@AddressID) + ' is not present in both tables.')) ~> Assert1

typeProperties.script:
parameters{
	rootfolder as string ('mycontainer'),
	cdmfolder as string ('cdmfolder')
}
source(output(
		TransactionId as string,
		SalesChannelId as string,
		PurchasingChannelId as string,
		TransactionInitiatedTimestamp as string,
		TransactionCompletedTimestamp as string,
		TransactionAmount as string,
		TotalRetailPriceAmount as string,
		TotalAdjustmentAmount as string,
		CustomerId as string,
		CustomerAccountId as string,
		TransactionTypeId as string,
		MerchantId as string,
		IsoCurrencyCode as string,
		LoyaltyProgramId as string,
		LoyaltyAccountId as string,
		StoreId as string,
		PaymentCardId as string,
		PointOfSaleId as string,
		TransactionClassificationId as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: false,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	entity: 'Transaction',
	format: 'cdm',
	manifestType: 'manifest',
	manifestName: 'Transaction.cdm.json',
	entityPath: 'Transaction',
	local: true,
	folderPath: 'CDMfolders',
	fileSystem: 'mycontainer') ~> source1
source1 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> sink1

parameters{
	rootfolder as string ('mycontainer'),
	cdmfolder as string ('cdmfolder')
}
source(output(
		TransactionId as string,
		SalesChannelId as string,
		PurchasingChannelId as string,
		TransactionInitiatedTimestamp as string,
		TransactionCompletedTimestamp as string,
		TransactionAmount as string,
		TotalRetailPriceAmount as string,
		TotalAdjustmentAmount as string,
		CustomerId as string,
		CustomerAccountId as string,
		TransactionTypeId as string,
		MerchantId as string,
		IsoCurrencyCode as string,
		LoyaltyProgramId as string,
		LoyaltyAccountId as string,
		StoreId as string,
		PaymentCardId as string,
		PointOfSaleId as string,
		TransactionClassificationId as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: false,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	entity: 'Transaction',
	format: 'cdm',
	manifestType: 'manifest',
	manifestName: 'Transaction.cdm.json',
	entityPath: 'Transaction',
	local: true,
	folderPath: ($cdmfolder),
	fileSystem: ($rootfolder)) ~> source1
source1 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	manifestType: 'manifest') ~> sink1

source(output(
		movie as integer,
		title as string,
		genres as string,
		year as integer,
		Rating as integer,
		RottenTomato as integer
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> newFile
source(output(
		movie as integer,
		title as string,
		genres as string,
		year as integer,
		Rating as integer,
		RottenTomato as integer
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> existingTable
newFile derive(fingerprint = sha2(256,columns())) ~> rowSignature
existingTable derive(fingerprint1 = sha2(256,columns())) ~> rowSignature1
rowSignature, rowSignature1 exists(fingerprint == fingerprint1,
	negate:true,
	broadcast: 'auto')~> Exists1
Exists1 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	input(
		movie as integer,
		title as string,
		genres as string,
		year as integer,
		Rating as integer,
		RottenTomato as integer
	),
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	format: 'table',
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	errorHandlingOption: 'stopOnFirstError',
	mapColumn(
		movie,
		title,
		genres,
		year,
		Rating,
		RottenTomato
	)) ~> sink1
